MESSAGES.ERROR_PUBLISH_CMMNFILE: An error occured while trying to publish the CMMN file

HUMANTASK.NOTIFICATION_OPERATION_INFO: This element is used to specify the operation used to invoke the notification.
HUMANTASK.NAMES_INFO: This element is the short title of a task.
HUMANTASK.SUBJECTS_INFO: This element is a longer text that describes the task.
HUMANTASK.DESCRIPTIONS_INFO: This element is a long description of the task.
HUMANTASK.NOTIFICATION_ASSIGNMENT_INFO: This element is used to specify people assigned to the notification.
HUMANTASK.PRESENTATION_PARAMETERS_INFO: This element specifies parameters used in presentation elements subject and description.
HUMANTASK.UPDATE_OPERATION_INFO: Defining parameters that are consumed and produced when the Operation is called
HUMANTASK.POTENTIAL_OWNER_INFO: Potential owners of a task are persons who receive the task so that they can claim and complete it.
HUMANTASK.EXCLUDED_OWNER_INFO: Excluded owners are are people who cannot become an actual or potential owner and thus they cannot reserve or start the task.
HUMANTASK.TASK_INITIATOR_INFO: Person who creates the task instance
HUMANTASK.TASK_STAKEHOLDER_INFO: The task stakeholders are the people ultimately responsible for the oversight and outcome of the task instance.
HUMANTASK.BUSINESS_ADMINSITRATOR_INFO: Business administrators play the same role as task stakeholders but at task definition level.
HUMANTASK.RECIPIENT_INFO: Notification recipients are persons who receive the notification, such as happens when a deadline is missed or when a milestone is reached.
HUMANTASK.NOTIFICATION_PRESENTATION_ELEMENT_INFO: The element is used to specify different information used to display the notification, such as name, subject and description, in a task list.
